template_description: Batteries included React template that supercharges your development.
React: A JavaScript library for building rich user interfaces
esbuild: A blazing fast JavaScript bundler with rich customizations
TailwindCSS: A utility-first CSS framework to build modern websites
ESLint: A JavaScript static analyzer that detects problems quickly
Prettier: An opinionated code formatter that supports many languages
Jest: A powerful JavaScript testing framework that focuses on simplicity
TypeScript: Strongly typed programming language for JavaScript
Framer Motion: A rich and extensive motion library for React
i18next: An excellent internationalization framework for JavaScript
React Icons: Opulent icon library for React from popular sources
Zod: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference
panel_disclaimer: This component serves as a quicklinks to the devtools used within the template. Feel free to delete this component if you don't need it or after your development.
feature_react: The latest React is used while setting up this template. Expect all the latest React features with low level configs available.
feature_routing: Configurations for client side routing with react-router-dom has already been setup. The implementation is located in App.tsx.
feature_bundler: The bundler used for this template is esbuild, which is a blazingly fast JavaScript bundler that has a lot of customizations available.
feature_tailwind: The latest TailwindCSS v3 that has a lot more features and class utilities had been included as well.
feature_formatter: Prettier is used as the formatter for the project. Rules can be modified in .prettierrc.yml file. Run pnpm format . to format the codebase.
feature_linter: ESLint is used as the linter to provide clean and standardized codes along with good practices that enhance the readability and maintainability of the code. Run pnpm lint to perform linting.
feature_dv: Zod has been used for data validation for user inputs. The user provided value can be verified before using it in the application.
feature_i18n: Internationalization for the project has been setup with i18next and the sample translation are provided in Japanese. The language switching component is also provided for convenience.
feature_dark: Dark mode has already been setup via TailwindCSS. The theme switcher component is provided for convenience and the mode of choice will persist through local storage.
feature_unit: Jest with @testing-library/react has been configured along with TypeScript. The integrations worked flawlessly.
feature_e2e: Playwright is included in the template for fast and cross browser end-to-end tests. The configuration is located at playwright.config.ts. Run e2e test by pnpm "test":e2e.
feature_animation: Framer motion is also installed in the template to provide powerful, smooth and fluid animation to the DOM elements.
feature_icon: react-icons is installed to provide SVG icons of various sources all inside one place.
